text: قال هؤلاء بناتى ان كنتم فعلين

translations.translation: He said, 'Here are my daughters if you are determined to do something.'
Here are my daughters," said Lot, "if you are so active."
Lot exclaimed in exasperation: "If you are bent on doing something, then here are my daughters."
Lot said, "These are my daughters if you want them."
He said, “These women of our tribe are my daughters, if you have to.”
[Lut] said: "These are my daughters, if you must act (so)."
He said: These are my daughters, if you will do (aught).
He said, 'These are my daughters, if you would be doing.'
He said: Here are my daughters, if ye must be doing (so).
He said, "Here are my daughters, if you must act in this way."
He said: these are my daughters, if act ye must.
He said, ‘These are my daughters, [marry them] if you should do anything.’
He said: "There are my daughters (to marry), if ye must act (so)."
[Lout (Lot)] said: "These (the girls of the nation) are my daughters (to marry lawfully), if you must act (so)."
He said: 'Here are my daughters; take them (in marriage), if you would be doing'
He said, “These are my daughters, if you must.”
[Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."
[15:71] He said, ‘These here are my daughters, if you must be doing’, what you desire [to do] in the way of satisfying your lust, then marry them. God, exalted be He, says:
278 He said: Here are my daughters) it is also said that this means: here are the daughters of my people, I will marry you to them, (if ye must be doing (so)) if you want to get married.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثمَّ بالغوا في الإصرار والعناد { قَالَ } لهم لوط: { هَؤُلآءِ } النسوان { بَنَاتِي إِن كُنْتُمْ فَاعِلِينَ } [الحجر: 71] فهو أولى بكم، وأظهر لقضاء وطركم

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: ولعله لم يكن حراماً في شريعته، أو يريد بالبنات نساء القوم فإن نبي كل أمة بمنزلة أبيهم، { إن كنتم فاعلين } قضاء الوطر، أو: ما أقول لكم من التزويج، فابوا، ولجوا في عملهم
